talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html> {ui_string: 1200001} </html>
<html> {ui_string: 1200002} </html>
<html> {ui_string: 1200003} </html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html> {ui_string: 1200005} </html>

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Sorry but I am busy at the moment. The reports I'm supposed to write for Calderock Village incident are endless… Phew...
Why don't you go and talk to the General or something?

$Argenta$
What are you doing here?
Go and do your own stuff.

$Argenta's Slave David$
Hey you! What about Argenta!
Why isn't she back yet!

$Bishop Ignacio$
General Douglas is gathering soldiers for battle. Go and talk to him.

$General Douglas$
The soldiers are all suffering from fatigue due to the prolonged battle with monsters.
Not to worry, we will send our troops to Dark Overlord Keep once we reorganize the troops.

$Bishop Ignacio$
General Douglas is gathering the troops. Go and talk to him.

$Argenta$
This is not the place where you should be right now.
Stop disturbing me and go do your own stuff.

$Argenta$
What are you doing here?
Go and do your work.

$Blond-haired Swordsman$
….
(Looks like he won't talk)

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Sorry but I am busy at the moment. The reports I'm supposed to write for Calderock Village incident are endless… Phew...

$General Douglas${action:talk}
I just returned.
Glad to see that you're back alive too.

${user_nick}$
We need to go to Dark Overlord Keep now.

$General Douglas$
Please be patient. There still are soldiers who have not returned yet, and many of the troops are exhausted from the long fight against the monsters at Dark Mine.

$General Douglas$
As soon as the troops have been reorganized, they will be dispatched to the DarK Overlord Keep, so don't worry.

$General Douglas$
I should go and check on the soldiers gathered.

$Argenta's Slave David$
Hey you! What about Argenta!
Why isn't she back yet!

$General Douglas$
Calrim, report to me.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
All men who are fit for battle are being summoned right now under an emergency.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
But since we have had a prolonged fight against the monsters for a long period of time, there are not many men left in the city.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
So I have asked the soldiers who were deployed to other place to return.
Please make other preparations as you wait for them to arrive.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
The troops are ready for dispatch now.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
I'm making a report to General Douglas right now.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
All troops have been gathered and are ready.
Please report to General Douglas, and wait for the next command.

$General Douglas$
So the troops are ready now.
Not as many soldiers as expected, but they are top class soldiers with much experience.
(General Douglas is proud of his soldiers)

$General Douglas$
The destination is Dark Overlord Keep... While fighting the Black Knight before, we were unable to go deeper into his territory. I hope we can get more information this time so that it will be useful in future battles.

$General Douglas${action:talk}
Let's go.
The soldiers will do their best, and I hope you will too. Don't give up until the Prophet is rescued.

${user_nick}$
Of course.

$General Douglas$
The first battalion should have left already.
Please set off to Dark Overlord Keep as soon as you are ready.

$General Douglas$
The first battalion should have left already.
Please set off to Dark Overlord Keep as soon as you are ready.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
The troops are ready now. They will follow you closely so please go to Dark Overlord Keep now.

$Bishop Ignacio$
You're leaving now? I hope General Douglas's soldiers are of help.
Quickly go to Dark Overlord Keep.

$Blond-haired Swordsman$
….
(Talking to Argenta)

$Argenta$
I knew you came from hearing your footsteps. {user_nick}.
You've managed to come all the way here.

${user_nick}$
Do you know that Blond-haired Swordsman?

$Argenta$
Of course. He's Geraint.
You know, the guy I talked about last time?

${user_nick}$
What? Him?!

$Argenta$
Yeah. What's with that response?
Have you met Geraint before?

${user_nick}$
I saw him fighting the Black Knight at Abandoned Welton Hollow.

$Argenta$
I see. You saw him losing the Black Knight under his nose.
Geraint, how the heck can you allow that scum to escape? I don't understand.

$Argenta$
Geraint! Are you listening?!!
(Geraint slowly opens his mouth)

$Argenta$
You shouldn't follow Geraint.

${user_nick}$
Why?

$Argenta$
Do not over estimate yourself and get yourself killed. Even I myself also doubt I can be of much help. So let's head to Foothills of Black Mountain now. Follow me and stay close.

$Argenta$
What are you waiting for?
Get yourself ready, we are going Foothills of Black Mountain soon.
Don't ever think of following Geraint with your skills. Understand?

$General Douglas$
How were things at Dark Overlord Keep?
The troops have returned safely.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Did you see Argenta? Try to receive all information you can from her.
(Talk to Argenta at Foothills of Black Mountain.)

$Geraint$
….
(Don’t think he'll talk)

$Argenta$
I don't think this is the place where you should be right now.
Don't disturb me and do your own stuff.

$Argenta$
I hope things are going well for Geraint.
That fool… He should have learnt his lesson last time when Velskud betrayed him. Why is he still so naïve?

${user_nick}$
Velskud? Isn't that the name of the Black Knight?

$Argenta$
What? Shouldn't you know all this before I even told you? You chased the Ancient all the way here, and now you're telling me you don't know anythingabout it??

${user_nick}$
Velskud and Geraint….

$Argenta's Slave David$
Velskud?! Geraint?!!
Aww… Master Argenta you're really awesome as I expected!!
You are friends with the Six Heroes?!!
(David shouts in excitement)

$Argenta$
Oh my ears… Why is he all excited out of a sudden….
Kid, I'm going to take a rest. Shut that idiot up!

$Argenta's Slave David$
Ha! Ha! Ha! Argenta didn’t forget me!

$Argenta's Slave David$
The great Master Argenta!
I knew she was not an ordinary person, but I never expected her to be friends with the legendary Six Heroes!!

${user_nick}$
Legendary Six Heroes? What's that?

$Argenta's Slave David$
…………?
Huh? Are you telling me you don't know the Six Heroes…?
Even the most stupidest person knows about the Six Heroes! How can you not know!!!!!

${user_nick}$
… I can't believe I am hearing insults from you..

$Argenta's Slave David$
Tsk tsk…. I'll specially exlain it to the poor dumb soul so listen carefully!!

$Argenta's Slave David$
It all started 50 years ago! Black Dragon Karas that had been critically wounded by the Sage was hiding in its nest until then, and it reawakened! Black Dragon Karas once again threatened all living things and made everyone tremble in fear! The hope for humanity was diminishing quickly... and at this moment...!

${user_nick}$
…Tell me only what's important, will you?

$Argenta's Slave David$
Tsk tsk… you should appreciate the whole story….
Anyway, Six heroes from various parts of the continent gathered to fight Black Dragon Karas.

$Argenta's Slave David$
First! There was Geraint, the blond swordsman who suddenly appeared out of nowhere to fight Black Dragon Karas! He was not only leader of the Dragon Slayers, but he was also the founder of Dragon Slayers! Without him, the Six Heroes wouldn't have existed!

$Argenta's Slave David$
Second! Knight Velskud! He was born in a low class noble family, but he climbed the ranks in lightning speed solely due to his fantastic fighting skills! A truly legendary knight!

$Argenta's Slave AdventurerAdventurer David$
Third! There was Barnac, the leader of mercenaries. The group of mercenaries he led formed the foundations for today's Adventurer's Guild! He is an idol to all warriors and adventurers alike!

$Argenta's Slave David$
Fourth! The leader of the Silver Crescent Archers, Nerwin! She came from a land of elves called Anu Arendel to establish ties with the human kingdom. She was later crowned the Queen of the Elf World when she returned.

$Argenta's Slave David$
Fifth! Terrence Terramai! The leader of the Templar Knights, the servants of the Goddess. After the Dragon Raid, he established the Terramai ORder and became the Pope!

$Argenta's Slave David$
Sixth! Karacule Fairystar! The successor of the famous Fairystar line of sorceresses who led the formidable Fairystar Mages team that has left a lasting impression to the monsters as well as the allies!

$Argenta's Slave David$
Phew…. I'm finally done. So?
Are you amazed by how knowledgeable the great Adventurer David is?!

${user_nick}$
Well… Velskud and Geraint that I met were…

$Argenta's Slave David$
What? They looked like they were in their 20's and were too strong to be considered as humans…? 50 years have passed since the Dragon Raid. All of the Six Heroes should be old by now except for Queen Nerwin…

$Argenta's Slave David$
Come to think of it… Velskud was thought to have passed away during the raid, and Geraint and Barnac were never seen again….
Does that mean that…. Argenta doesn't know the Six Heroes…?

${user_nick}$
Anyway, I should be heading back to the Royal Castle….

$Argenta's Slave David$
I thought I would be able to see my idol, Geraint.
Anyway, why are you always going to the Royal Castle?

${user_nick}$
I promised to find the Prophet…

$Argenta's Slave David$
Tsk tsk… young rookie full of confidence but failing to deliver….
Do you think Argenta would even care! Argenta my queen! Mine only! Ha! Ha!

$Argenta$
What are you waiting for?
I'll be going to Foothill of Foothills of Black Mountain, so be there.
Don't even think about following Geraint!

$Argenta$
Did you really wentRoyal Castle? I don't think you did. Are you thinking about following Geraint, are you? You are just a nuisance to him. So stop thinking about it and do what you need to do.

$Argenta$
Well, human towns have many things around like that Adventurer's Guild or something. Go and train and get stronger.
(Report to Bishop Ignacio)

$Bishop Ignacio$
Welcome back.
Did you find the Black Knight?
(Tell him what you saw)

$Bishop Ignacio$
I see…. Fortress of the Dark Overlord Army… It would be a challenge to enter that place alone. So the swordsman who was with Argenta went alone?

${user_nick}$
Yes.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Bishop Ignacio$
While you were chasing the Black Knight, I tried convincing his highness with other nobles...
But with the current situation in Saint Haven, it's hard to gather more troops.

${user_nick}$
We need to hurry.

$Argenta's Slave David$
Whatever you do, I'll be the only slave for Argenta! Ha! Ha! Ha!
(Report to Bishop Ignacio)

journal.title: Prepare to dispatch troops
journal.contents:
Talk to General Douglas about troop dispatch.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → General Douglas

journal.title: Calrim's Report
journal.contents:
General Douglas is gathering all men who are ready for battle. Go and check on the situation.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → General Douglas
journal.todo_msg: Find out about troop status from Elite Soldier Calrim.

journal.title: Report to General Douglas
journal.contents:
Finished gathering men for battle. Wait for General Douglas's orders.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → General Douglas
journal.todo_msg: Since all the troops are ready, wait for General Douglas's orders.

journal.title: To Dark Overlord Keep
journal.contents:
General Douglas said he will lend you his troops. Go to Dark Overlord Keep.

Foothills of Black Mountain (Dark Overlord Gates) → Dark Overlord Keep
journal.destination: Chase after the Black Knight at Dark Overlord Keep
journal.todo_msg: Go to Dark Overlord Keep and chase after the Black Knight.

journal.title: The Black Knight's Location
journal.contents:
You arrived at Dark Overlord Keep, Black Knight was not in sight but you met Argenta and a blond-haired Swordsman
Talk to Argenta.

Foothills of Black Mountain (Dark Overlord Gates) → Dark Overlord Keep (Argenta)
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Dark Overlord Keep
journal.todo_msg: The Black Knight is nowhere to be seen. Talk to Argenta.

journal.title: Blond Swordsman
journal.contents:
The blond-haired swordsman who was fighting with the Black Knight at Abandoned Welton Hollow was the knight named Geraint whom Argenta was looking for. He left alone to find the Black Knight.
Talk to Argenta to discuss what to do next.

Foothills of Black Mountain (Dark Overlord Gates) → Dark Overlord Keep (Argenta)
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Dark Overlord Keep

journal.title: Argenta
journal.contents:
Geraint rushed to chase the Black Knight. Since you cannot follow Geraint right away, talk to Argenta at Foothills of Foothills of Black Mountain.

Foothills of Black Mountain → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Foothills of Black Mountain
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Argenta at Foothills of Black Mountain

journal.title: Noisy Adventurer David
journal.contents:
David got excieted when he heard about Velskud and Geraint while you were talking to Argenta.
Go to Foothills of Black Mountain and talk to David.

Foothills of Black Mountain → Argenta's Slave David
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain

journal.title: Do what you need to do now
journal.contents:
You are not allow to follow Geraint right now. Head to the Royal Castle first, and report to Ignacio and request for support.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: Report to Bishop Ignacio at the Royal Castle
